p: ZIKV was isolated from human serum samples by direct inoculation of C6/36 (5 x 10 5 cells seeded in a 25 cm 2 Tissue Culture Flask) and Vero E6 cells (10 5 cells seeded in a 25 cm 2 Tissue Culture Flask) or by intracerebral inoculation of 2-day-old BALB/c mice (CEUA Fiocruz: LW-2/17) as detailed below.
